description: Goddess of love and beauty and ruler of the angel world. She is unable to leave the angel world and must rely on Limone and the Love Angels to ward off the devils. She is the sister of Angel Celeste, Momoko`s mother, and considered Momoko`s aunt respectively. In Wedding Peach DX, it is revealed after defeating Raindevila that Aphrodite erased the Love Angels, Limone`s, Yousuke`s, and Takuro`s memories of anything to do with angels and devils in order for them to live normal lives again. She then makes the Love Angel`s memories known again because due to the revolting devils, with the exception of Limone.
name: Aphrodite
